name: hoh-helper
description: Easily export your Heroes of History game data—including city layouts, heroes, equipment, leaderboards, and more—to Forge of Games.

scripts.build:dev: node build.js dev && copyfiles -u 1 public/**/* dist

scripts.build:prod: node build.js prod && copyfiles -u 1 public/**/* dist
